heading: Season 7 2.1.3 Patch Notes
content: Blizzard showcased the Diablo 4 Season 7 2.1.3 Patch Notes planned on March 4th in a few days! Season 7: Season of Witchcraft has been running for quite some time now here and while the keeps ensuring our Build Guides stays as relevant as possible, patches keep rolling! We hope you enjoy the Season of Witchcraft with the aid of our Season 7 updates. Our focus for the start of Season 7 is to make sure our are solid with all the new Item updates, new features and mechanic changes. We're continuing to work on more updates for If you haven't already, head over to our to stay up to date with our content development. Written by:
